subject: Fwd: Facebook new app update let them record sound & video from your phone, at any time, without your consent
text:
Worth investigating....


-------- Message d'origine --------
De : Smarthart <mark.lizar@gmail.com>
Envoyé: Tue Jun 25 15:19:24 UTC+02:00 2013
À : "opennotice@googlegroups.com" <opennotice@googlegroups.com>
Objet : Facebook new app update let them record sound & video from your phone, at any time, without your consent


I am not sure if this is alarmist or not. But, I am definitely deleting the facebook app. 

We definitely need ' 'Disconnect Me' How do we withdraw consent?   



- Mark

http://crisisboom.com/2013/01/19/facebook-new-app-update-let-them-record-sound-video-from-your-phone-at-any-time-without-your-consent/
